resources.string: About PvP Reward Track

The PvP Reward Track contains PvP-specific rewards for doing PvP activities in the game. The track can be completed and run again to get a different selection of rewards, with more prestigious rewards becoming available as more tracks are completed.
Progress your track by defeating other players and engaging in PvP Missions, War, Outpost Rush, Capturing Forts, and 3v3 Arenas.

Azoth Salt is a currency that allows you to acquire rewards from the PvP Track. You can gain Azoth Salt by engaging in War, Outpost Rush, 3v3 Arenas, PvP Missions, killing players in the open world, and earning XP while flagged.
Choose between unique rewards such as prestige armor and weapons, emotes, currencies, and consumables.

At level 60, you're now able to<font color="#edc63e"> upgrade your equipment </font>to higher gear scores. To do this, you'll need to harvest Gypsum from various Level 60 activities and locations. Visit a<font color="#edc63e"> Gypsum Kiln </font>to learn more.
<font color="#ebe3d6" >You've recently achieved Max Level - there's plenty more to do.</font>
Endgame Expeditions, including rotating weekly Mutations for the best rewards.
Elite landmarks, Trial Arenas, and open world challenges for groups.

At level 60, you're now able to<font color="#edc63e"> upgrade your equipment </font>to higher gear scores. To do this, you'll need to harvest Gypsum from various Level 60 activities and locations. Visit a<font color="#edc63e"> Gypsum Kiln </font>to learn more.
About Endgame Activities

Available now from the map! Access all Expeditions (as long as you have visited it once) by selecting the Expedition's icon. From here you can browse or post Group Finder lobbies, or enter the Expedition directly with your existing group.
About Group Finder
Fresh worlds. Fresh economy. Fresh start.
Arm yourself with the all-new Great Sword and Heartgem and journey to the deserts of Brimstone Sands, or start the new Main Story quest!
Begin your journey in a fresh world, and watch your favorite streamers do the same in the Return to Aeternum event on Twitch until 11/18.
Brimstone Sands, Great Sword, and Nightveil Hallow items are now available in the store. Don't forget to pickup your free anniversary skins!

With the new Great Sword and Heartgem ability runes, explore the new Brimstone Sands zone and the Ennead Expedition, or experience the revamped Main Story Quest with new locations, NPCs, challenges, and rewards.\n\nTo access the main storyline quests in Brimstone Sands, players must have completed the quest "A Selfless Nature" in Edengrove and the quest "Strider of the Sands," which can be picked up in multiple locations.

Start a new character on worlds that are certified fresh, or follow your favorite streamers in the Return to Aeternum event on Twitch. Watch as they battle for glory on fresh worlds until 11/18.\n\nhttp://www.twitch.tv/playnewworld
Fresh Start Worlds are now live! Only new characters can be a part of these worlds.
About Return to Aeternum
Battle For New World Panel 1 Title
Battle for New World Panel 1, Bullet 1 Title
Battle for New World Panel 1, Bullet 1 Text.

Battle for New World Panel 3 Subtitle\n \nhttp://www.twitch.tv/playnewworld
About Battle For New World
The Free Weekend is in progress.

During this limited-time event, experience the new Brimstone Sands zone, revamped Main Story Quest, and latest updates to New World for free!

To play with friends, characters must be on the same world. Free players enjoy unlimited session times unless there is a queue for the world (at the end of a session, free players will be asked to requeue).

New players can also save 50% on the Standard and Deluxe editions of New World when purchased between December 15 at 10AM PT and January 5 at 10AM PT.
Free Weekend In Progress Panel 1, Bullet 1 Title

Free Weekend Ending Soon Panel 3 Subtitle\n \nhttp://www.twitch.tv/playnewworld
About Free Weekend

Leaderboards track various New World activities across settlements and factions. Compete with other players in various individual, company, and faction activities to ascend the leaderboards, which reset periodically.\n\n<font color="#edc63e">Access Leaderboards in the Modes Menu. </font>

Protect yourself from the ravages of Forever Winter with new cosmetics available in the store! You'll want to kit yourself out with the latest winter weapons and apparel when the days grow shorter and long nights of terror await. Check the store regularly for free gifts in December and take advantage of our winter sales! Special unvaulted content goes on sale 12/13 and last year's Winter Convergence gear arrives on 12/20!
About Winter Convergence

Is the shape of winter the shadow of a dragon? Visit the store for new cosmetics kissed by the frosty breath of the serpent! Don't get caught unprepared when less lethal combat breaks out! Pick up the Slap Fight emote or opt for the Tiptoe Walk in order to sneak past any violent squabbles instead!
About Winter Dragon

Will winter release its icy grasp upon the land or will spring blossom and bring new hope to Aeternum? Consult your oracle and outfit yourself with the new skins in the Store! New heart emotes can help you find romance amid the long, dark days of winter!
About Omens Of Winter
Legendary foundry where Ancients forged their devastating engines of war. Those who hunger for power yearn for the eldritch magics unleashed in these colossal ruins.
About Empyrean Forge
Embark on a new journey with Grace O'Malley as she forms Aeternum's newest mercenary company, the Silver Crows.

The fires of the Forge burn brightly within this month's new store items! Feel the burn with brand new skins and decor items. Get into the competitive spirit with new emotes that can express your triumph or comfort your poor, humbled enemies! Get them while they're hot!

Scoundrels and brigands are on the loose in Aeternum! Outfit yourself in the store with new Highwaymen items and join their ranks. Don the garb of the Ringleader and take charge with three variants of headgear - perfect for whatever level of disguise you require!

Dost thou hath weapons and armor from the days of Yore? Gothic skins based on real designs from the 16th and 17th centuries are now available to buy in the store. Smite your foes while wearing solid steel fit for a hero of old, or strike terror in your enemies while clad in menacing armor. Regardless of your choice, your rivals will shudder in fear when you brandish thine weapon. With these tried and true armaments, victory on the field of battle is nearly ensured.
About Knights Errant
There's riches to be had on Aeternum for those willing to take them. Outlaws and brigands should head to the store for new apparel and weapon skins. Don't wander the wasteland unprepared!
About Wasteland Frontier

Using the power of Transmog Tokens, Stylemancers can change the appearance of your weapons and gear to look like any others you've already obtained.\n\nBe fashionably early to the party and start earning them from the Season 2 pass now before the Stylemancers arrive in August!

Using the power of Transmog Tokens, Stylemancers in every city can change the appearance of your weapons and armors to look like any that you've collected. These skins can then be dyed to fit your desired fashion!\n\nCollect Transmog Tokens from Elite Chest Runs, the Season Pass, or the Store and start your stylish journey today!
Outpost Rush now supports cross world play! Eliminate enemies, collect resources and fortify defenses with players from anywhere in your region.
Scoring: More points for defending, capturing, and tanking.
Summon Stones: Removed Azoth costs. Close the portal for the Demon Stone, and slay the Alpha Wolf for the Bear Stone.
Baroness: New barriers added to its arena.
About Cross-World Outpost Rush

The Angry Earth have overrun Old First Light. Answering the sinister call of the Ancient huntress Adiana, they've destroyed homes and taken our friends captive, now subjecting them to unknown horrors behind a wall of thorns barring entry to any adventurers.
Quests: All regional quests from Old First Light have been canceled.
Storage: Once all items are claimed, Old First Light storage will be closed.
Trading Post: Any pending transactions are accessible from other territories.
Housing: A compensation for the loss of housing has been made. All furniture from your home has been placed in the storage.
Governing Company: A one-time deposit has been paid into your treasury for the loss of the territory.
About First Light Has Fallen
Reel fun awaits at the Medleyfaire!

Aeternum's summer festival returns! Unlock a new jam by completing Event Activities; then strum away to collect Medleyfaire tokens and a new title. Celebrate at the festival grounds in Monarch's Bluff, Everfall, Brightwood, and Weavers Fen.
About Summer Medleyfaire

The rekindled fires of Ennead called the primal terror from the deep beneath the sands. Now the Great Devourer stalks the dunes of Brimstone once again. Gather your bravest warriors at the Ambuscade. Can you defeat the spawn of the Titans? \n\n<font color="#edc63e">Requires 20 person raid group.</font>
About Arena of Shah Neshen

Dark forces have unearthed The Hatchery, a long-forgotten chamber, buried deep beneath the sands of Neapolis. There, they conspire to rip Aeternum asunder with a horde of sandwurms.\n\nRally with up to nine other adventurers to crush wave after wave of enemies in this high stakes, high reward trial. Stand victorious, and walk away with unique riches.
About The Hatchery
About Deep Sea

A new epic adventure awaits you and the Silver Crows in the sweltering heat of Brimstone Sands.

Malek, a man claiming to be with the ancient order Blood of the Sands, is willing to pay you handsomely for primordial artifacts - Sandwurm eggs.
Join Grace O'Malley, Zander, and a new cast of characters as you discover the ancient power that has awakened beneath the shifting dunes.

<font color="#edc63e">Level 60 players</font> can start their adventure by visiting any Crow's Nest location found in Edengrove, Shattered Mountain, and Brimstone Sands.
About Season Two
The fight promoter, Maximus Marcellus, is spreading word of a ruined gladiatorial pit in Brimstone Sands.\n\nGather your team and your wits to master this new arena of varying heights!
About New 3v3 Arena Map

There is a constant swirl in the balance between light and shadow, the real and the void. Do you take sides in this eternal conflict? Or do you remain committed to neutrality? Take a stand and look for new apparel skins, weapon skins, and emote bundles in the store throughout the month!

Sharif's Blood of the Sands mages are under attack! While transporting valuable Sandwurm Eggs to secure locations around Aeternum, these mages have been assaulted by the forces of Adiana. Enraged Sulfur Elementals are attempting to destroy the eggs and eradicate the wurms from Aeternum. Defend the eggs and earn valuable rewards including powerful gear, the Sandwurm Egg housing item, and the Mini Devourer Sandwurm Hat.
About Siege of Sulfur

Ride mounts through the lush greenery of Elysian Wilds or follow your favorite streamers in the Call of the Wilds event on Twitch. Watch as they experience new Influence Races, encounter primordial Beast Lords, and explore powerful new combat options until 10/09/2023.\n\nAnswer the Call!
About Call of the Wilds

A new threat arises in the dark jungles of the Elysian Wilds, and only you can rise to face it.

Rumors are spreading of the terrors that await unwary travelers beyond the borders of the forest. Delve into the unknown to brave the Wilds and put a stop to Artemis' ancient and powerful magics — before her primal army wipes out all humanity from the face of Aeternum.

<font color="#edc63e"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font">Purchase the Rise of the Angry Earth DLC</font></font> to unlock the Elysian Wilds, as well as exclusive content such as the brand-new Flail, powerful Artifacts, exclusive craftables, and Mounts!
About Rise of the Angry Earth

The scourge of the Angry Earth has risen! Complete Season 3 Activities and Journey Challenges to claim new, exclusive prizes — from all-new gear unearthed in the savage depths of the Elysian Wilds to mysterious Artifacts more powerful than anything seen before.
About Season Three

Two wild Beast Lords have retreated to the ancient caverns beneath the Elysian Wilds. There, they lie in wait, amassing their strength as elemental rage twists them and their tribes into savage creatures. Rally together with your fellow fighters and delve into the dark miasma of the Savage Divide to face the ferocious Beast Lords and stem the onslaught of Medusa’s foul magics!\n\n<font color="#edc63e"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font">Requires Rise of the Angry Earth.</font></font>
About Savage Divide

In Northern Everfall, the son of a legendary warlord has long been searching for a way to put his prowess as a horse trainer to use, and he wants you to assist him! Find Jochi in Everfall to begin your journey as a trainer, befriend three species of Mounts, and level up your loyal four-legged friends by feeding them and taking part in timed races and rallies!\n\n<font color="#edc63e"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font">Requires Rise of the Angry Earth.</font></font>

What do you see in the early dawn at first light? The elegant beauty and raw power of nature? Or the flash of ancient steel, the flex of a finely crafted bow? New elegant and deadly implements are in the Store now!
About Opulent Verdure

Take up arms against the Angry Earth scourge with the all-new Flail! Craft your own or slay your enemies in search of one, then swing your way to victory using both magic and might!\n\n<font color="#edc63e"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font">Requires Rise of the Angry Earth.</font></font>
About the Flail

Mysterious Artifacts have been unearthed across Aeternum, each bearing unique and powerful abilities waiting to be harnessed! Begin the search for yours today, then embark on unique quests to strengthen and attune your artifact until it — and you — are more powerful than ever!\n\n<font color="#edc63e"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font">Requires Rise of the Angry Earth.</font></font>

Join forces with friends to conquer Watch Towers and spread your faction’s influence across the lands of Aeternum! Battle for the right to lay siege to enemy territories by taking part in daily influence races — or hold your own against invading forces to prove your mettle to those who would try to usurp your lands.

Nightveil Hallow returns as Baalphazu, Marquis of Terror rises once again! Banish the shadowy demon back to the darkness, then celebrate your victory by donning unique costumes and trick-or-treating for brand new candy rewards in houses across Aeternum!

The barrier between the spirit world and the physical world is thin on Aeternum. Be careful what spirits you summon! They just may stay longer than you planned. Visit the Shop today for nightmarish new visions!
About Umbral Rites

The feathered fiend is back to terrorize the lands of Aeternum! And this time he’s amassed an army of his own. Evade explosive eggs and beak beams in monstrous combat!

Face off against the gargantuan gobbler to collect rewards old and new.
“Turkulon’s Claw” is now unbreakable, with skinning effects persisting after the event. Swing a Turkey Leg on a giant fork with the new Warhammer skin!
About Turkulon Returns

Beware the threat on the horizon! The Dark Legion invades the store this month! Special item skins for those who have abandoned the code of chivalry are now available. Arm yourself for battle and smile as your opponents' blood runs cold at the sight of you!
About Knightsbane Legion

Do you bash your way through mobs or do you prefer to stand back and set them aflame? Or perhaps draw the perfect aim with your bow? Whatever your style, visit the store for special promo bundles featuring unvaulted content and brand new skins! Select housing items and tool skins are 50% for a limited time!
About Black Friday Deals
In a ravaged and uncertain place like Aeternum, it is rare to find one fully committed to honor and loyalty. If you walk the warrior's path, visit the Store for new Ronin's Shadow items!
About December MTX Placeholder

The time of Frozen Wrath is nigh upon us! Complete Season 4 Activities and Journey Challenges to claim new, exclusive prizes — chill your bones in all-new gear unearthed from the icy depths of the Glacial Tarn, and gather unique artifacts as you lead the Silver Crows to battle the full might of Winter.
About Eternal Frost

The Winter Warrior and his glacial minions have descended upon Aeternum once again, bringing with them the icy threat of the forever Winter! Gather your friends and spread the warmth and cheer of the Convergence to fight back the bitter chill, then seek out the jolly Winter Wanderer in Winter Villages across Aeternum to earn a bounty of limited-time rewards!
About Winter Convergence

Icy primordial forces have been unearthed within Great Cleave, summoned forth by the twisted experiments of Ser Loth! Delve into the freezing depths of the Glacial Tarn, where ancient and powerful elemental magicks await. Harness the power of the Empyrean Flame to battle your way through the glacial onslaught, and put an end to the dark mage’s plot once and for all!
About Glacial Tarn

Crassus returns with his monstrous legion in tow! Rally your forces and battle the brutish captains Decimus and Lucanus in Brightwood, Mourningdale, Weaver’s Fen, Edengrove, and Ebonscale Reach. Fight back the Roman onslaught and defeat the dark grasp of Corruption for honor, glory, and limited-time rewards!
About Legacy of Crassus
Ronin's Shadow stretches longer over the land! Visit the shop for new samurai-themed items!
About Ronin Part II

Celebrate the Lunar New Year with the denizens of Ebonscale Reach. Cook up delicious food at the hot pot, take in the spectacular fireworks in the evening, and complete tribute runs to gain the Dragon's blessing during the Year of the Dragon.
About Year of the Dragon

With a heart as cold as the frozen landscape and a willingness to fight in conditions unbearable for others, the Winter Mercenary is a fearsome foe! Outfit yourself for the winter months with new items available in the Store!
About Winter Mercenary
The new Activity Finder adds Cross World Expeditions alongside an improved Group Finding experience. Check out the new Activities Menu to find it.\n\nNew stuff includes:
Cross World matchmaker will fill groups for Normal and Mutated Expeditions (M1 and M2 only)
Bonus rewards when queuing for Random and for playing as healer or tank

The Season of Trials has arrived! Revisit old foes and chase exciting, new artifacts. Venture into the Winter Rune Forge and fight all that await with ten of your closest friends. Earn incredible rewards including skins, artifacts, and more with the Season of Trials reward track.
It's no joke when Death knocks on your door! Visit the store for new Grim Reaper items available for a limited time! You might as well look sharp on your way to the Underworld!
About Reaper's Embrace

Why get your hands dirty swinging a sword or hammer when you can stand back and launch balls of fire into the battle? Even better, why not look good while doing it? New cosmetics have teleported into the Store, perfect for the discerning Battle Mage!
About Battle Mage Placeholder
